Address: 1601 22ND ST, WEST DES MOINES, Iowa, 50266, United States of America
CompanyDescription: West Bancorporation, Inc. (the Company or West Bancorporation) is an Iowa corporation and a financial holding company registered under the Bank Holding Company Act of 1956, as amended (BHCA). The Company was formed in 1984 to own West Bank, an Iowa-chartered bank headquartered in West Des Moines, Iowa. West Bank is a business-focused community bank that was organized in 1893. The Company's primary activity during 2019 was the ownership of West Bank. The Company's and West Bank's only business is banking, and therefore, no segment information is presented in this report. As a financial holding company, the Company has additional flexibility to engage in a broader range of financial activities through affiliates than are permissible for bank holding companies that are not financial holding companies.  ...
